snippet.title: Sherman Commander - Announcement Trailer (FULL VERSION)
snippet.description:
🎮 ADD TO YOUR STEAM WISHLIST NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1451050/Sherman_Commander/

Command a platoon of Sherman tanks over the most famous theaters of WW2. Take the commander’s seat and give specific orders to your crew, or open the tactical map to coordinate your actions with accompanying units.

Developer: Iron Wolf Studio S.A.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ironwolfstudio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/I_W_Studio
WWW: https://www.ironwolfstudio.com

Music producer & composer : WeiFan Chang
Orchestrator : Fabio Amurri
